messages.messageBody:
-=-oh i guess its a "ning" - sorry about that - i should have read
further before posting...not such great stuff i am finding now...-=-

Even if it had been a fantastic unschooling site, please post
something personal or particular to this list with each post you
make. People can find great sites with google. I'm trying to
preserve this list for things that can pretty much only be found on
this list.

Thanks,

Sandra

oh i guess its a "ning" - sorry about that - i should have read further before posting...not such great stuff i am finding now...




just happened upon this site and at quick perusal came upon a pro unschooling article and a pro-breastfeeding article - haven't read deeper, but thought i'd pass the site on - wonder if anyone's heard of it?

http://www.babble.com/content/aboutus/missionstatement
